Report Typos and Errors

SVDErrorType

The error type used to assess accuracy of computed solutions

Synopsis

typedef enum { SVD_ERROR_ABSOLUTE,
               SVD_ERROR_RELATIVE,
               SVD_ERROR_NORM } SVDErrorType;

See Also

SVDComputeError()
